ai-tha-ap384:1.4_0: while walking along I glanced at her.
ai-tha-ap384:3.3_0: Having given the fruit of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap384:3.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap384:4.3_0: all the precious things that rise.
ai-tha-ap384:5.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
ai-tha-ap384:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap384:5.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap384:6.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap384:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap384:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Macchikāsaṇḍa.
ai-tha-ap384:10.1_0: The senior monks with an adulter,
